      public void setPlayerAvailable​(int id, boolean value)
      Sets the availability of a player slot.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the slot to set.
      value - Whether to set this slot to available or not.

    • getPlayerAvailable

      public boolean getPlayerAvailable​(int id)
      Gets if the given player is available (can be joined).
      Parameters:
      id - The player ID to check the availability for.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating if the player is available.

    • hasSelectedPlayer

      public boolean hasSelectedPlayer()
      Checks if the user has already chosen a player. Always check with this method before getting a selected player.
      Returns:
      Boolean which is true when the user has selected a player.

    • getSelectedPlayer

      public java.lang.Integer getSelectedPlayer()
      Gets the ID of the player the user has selected.
      Returns:
      The ID of the selected player.

    • setSelectedPlayer

      public void setSelectedPlayer​(java.lang.Integer id)
      Sets the player selected by the user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to link to the user.

    • join

      public void join​(java.lang.String token) throws GameNotFoundException, ServerConnectionException
      Joins an already existing game with a token
      Parameters:
      token - The token that the user has provided
      Throws:
      GameNotFoundException - Gets thrown when no game with the given token was found
      ServerConnectionException - Gets thrown when no connection with firebase could be made

    • host

      public void host() throws ServerConnectionException
      Hosts/starts a new empty game
